sqlMap.select: select ID, PRO_CODE, PRO_NAME, CO_CODE, CO_NAME, COMPLETION_CODE, CAI_GOU_TIME, PRO_CONTENT, ENTRUST_CODE, CAI_GOU_TYPE, MONEY_SOURCE, MONEY_CLOSE_ACCOUNT, MARKET_PRICE, PLAN_MONEY, ACTUAL_STOCK_MONEY, ACTUAL_SAVE_MONEY, ACTUAL_SAVE_RATE, TENDER_DEPART, TENDER_CODE, BID_DEPART, BID_DEPART_CODE, SUPERVISION_DEPART, SUPERVISION_DEPART_CODE, CHENGBAN_STATUS, CHENGBAN_MAN, CHENGBAN_DEPART, CHENGBAN_MSG, CHENGBAN_DATE, REPORT_DATE, EXECUTOR, EXECUTOR_NAME,PROCESS_INST_ID,IS_GOON_AUDIT,PROJECT_NATURE from ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION where ID = #completionId#

select ID, PRO_CODE, PRO_NAME, CO_CODE, CO_NAME, COMPLETION_CODE, CAI_GOU_TIME, PRO_CONTENT, ENTRUST_CODE, CAI_GOU_TYPE, MONEY_SOURCE, MONEY_CLOSE_ACCOUNT, MARKET_PRICE, PLAN_MONEY, ACTUAL_STOCK_MONEY, ACTUAL_SAVE_MONEY, ACTUAL_SAVE_RATE, TENDER_DEPART, TENDER_CODE, BID_DEPART, BID_DEPART_CODE, SUPERVISION_DEPART, SUPERVISION_DEPART_CODE, CHENGBAN_STATUS, CHENGBAN_MAN, CHENGBAN_DEPART, CHENGBAN_MSG, CHENGBAN_DATE, REPORT_DATE, EXECUTOR, EXECUTOR_NAME,PROCESS_INST_ID,IS_GOON_AUDIT,PROJECT_NATURE from ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION where 1=1
ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION.COMPLETION_CODE = #zcText1# ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION.PRO_CODE = #projCode#
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_TODO where executor =#executor# and instance_id = ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_UNTREAD where executor =#executor# and instance_id = ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where executor = #executor# and instance_id = ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION.process_inst_id) and ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION.CHENGBAN_STATUS != 'cancel' and ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION.CHENGBAN_STATUS != 'exec'
( exists (select WF_DRAFT_NAME from as_wf_draft where user_id=#executor# and compo_id=#wfcompoId# and WF_DRAFT_ID=ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION.process_inst_id) or ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION.process_inst_id = -1 ) and ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION.CHENGBAN_STATUS != 'cancel'
(ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION.CHENGBAN_STATUS ='exec')
ORDER BY ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION.ID
sqlMap.insert: insert into ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION (ID, PRO_CODE, PRO_NAME, CO_CODE, CO_NAME, COMPLETION_CODE, CAI_GOU_TIME, PRO_CONTENT, ENTRUST_CODE, CAI_GOU_TYPE, MONEY_SOURCE, MONEY_CLOSE_ACCOUNT, MARKET_PRICE, PLAN_MONEY, ACTUAL_STOCK_MONEY, ACTUAL_SAVE_MONEY, ACTUAL_SAVE_RATE, TENDER_DEPART, TENDER_CODE, BID_DEPART, BID_DEPART_CODE, SUPERVISION_DEPART, SUPERVISION_DEPART_CODE, CHENGBAN_STATUS, CHENGBAN_MAN, CHENGBAN_DEPART, CHENGBAN_MSG, CHENGBAN_DATE, REPORT_DATE, EXECUTOR, EXECUTOR_NAME,PROCESS_INST_ID,IS_GOON_AUDIT,PROJECT_NATURE,ORG_CODE,AGENCY) values (#completionId#, #proCode:VARCHAR#, #proName:VARCHAR#, #coCode:VARCHAR#, #coName:VARCHAR#, #completionCode:VARCHAR#, #caiGouTime:DATE#, #proContent:VARCHAR#, #entrustCode:VARCHAR#, #caiGouType:VARCHAR#, #moneySource:VARCHAR#, #moneyCloseAccount:VARCHAR#, #marketPrice:DECIMAL#, #planMoney:DECIMAL#, #actualStockMoney:DECIMAL#, #actualSaveMoney:DECIMAL#, #actualSaveRate:DECIMAL#, #tenderDepart:VARCHAR#, #tenderCode:VARCHAR#, #bidDepart:VARCHAR#, #bidDepartCode:VARCHAR#, #supervisionDepart:VARCHAR#, #supervisionDepartCode:VARCHAR#, #chengbanStatus:VARCHAR#, #chengbanMan:VARCHAR#, #chengbanDepart:VARCHAR#, #chengbanMsg:VARCHAR#, #chengbanDate:DATE#, #reportDate:DATE#, #editUserId:VARCHAR#, #editUserName:VARCHAR#,#processInstId:DECIMAL#,#isGoonAudit:DECIMAL#,#projectNature:VARCHAR#,#orgCode#,#agency#)
sqlMap.update: update ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION set PRO_CODE = #proCode:VARCHAR#, PRO_NAME = #proName:VARCHAR#, CO_CODE = #coCode:VARCHAR#, CO_NAME = #coName:VARCHAR#, COMPLETION_CODE = #completionCode:VARCHAR#, CAI_GOU_TIME = #caiGouTime:DATE#, PRO_CONTENT = #proContent:VARCHAR#, ENTRUST_CODE = #entrustCode:VARCHAR#, CAI_GOU_TYPE = #caiGouType:VARCHAR#, MONEY_SOURCE = #moneySource:VARCHAR#, MONEY_CLOSE_ACCOUNT = #moneyCloseAccount:VARCHAR#, MARKET_PRICE = #marketPrice:DECIMAL#, PLAN_MONEY = #planMoney:DECIMAL#, ACTUAL_STOCK_MONEY = #actualStockMoney:DECIMAL#, ACTUAL_SAVE_MONEY = #actualSaveMoney:DECIMAL#, ACTUAL_SAVE_RATE = #actualSaveRate:DECIMAL#, TENDER_DEPART = #tenderDepart:VARCHAR#, TENDER_CODE = #tenderCode:VARCHAR#, BID_DEPART = #bidDepart:VARCHAR#, BID_DEPART_CODE = #bidDepartCode:VARCHAR#, SUPERVISION_DEPART = #supervisionDepart:VARCHAR#, SUPERVISION_DEPART_CODE = #supervisionDepartCode:VARCHAR#, CHENGBAN_STATUS = #chengbanStatus:VARCHAR#, CHENGBAN_MAN = #chengbanMan:VARCHAR#, CHENGBAN_DEPART = #chengbanDepart:VARCHAR#, CHENGBAN_MSG = #chengbanMsg:VARCHAR#, CHENGBAN_DATE = #chengbanDate:DATE#, REPORT_DATE = #reportDate:DATE#, EXECUTOR = #editUserId:VARCHAR#, EXECUTOR_NAME = #editUserName:VARCHAR#, PROCESS_INST_ID = #processInstId:DECIMAL#, IS_GOON_AUDIT = #isGoonAudit:DECIMAL#, PROJECT_NATURE = #projectNature:VARCHAR# where ID = #completionId#

update ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION
PRO_CODE = #proCode:VARCHAR#
PRO_NAME = #proName:VARCHAR#
CO_CODE = #coCode:VARCHAR#
CO_NAME = #coName:VARCHAR#
COMPLETION_CODE = #completionCode:VARCHAR#
CAI_GOU_TIME = #caiGouTime:DATE#
PRO_CONTENT = #proContent:VARCHAR#
ENTRUST_CODE = #entrustCode:VARCHAR#
CAI_GOU_TYPE = #caiGouType:VARCHAR#
MONEY_SOURCE = #moneySource:VARCHAR#
MONEY_CLOSE_ACCOUNT = #moneyCloseAccount:VARCHAR#
MARKET_PRICE = #marketPrice:DECIMAL#
PLAN_MONEY = #planMoney:DECIMAL#
ACTUAL_STOCK_MONEY = #actualStockMoney:DECIMAL#
ACTUAL_SAVE_MONEY = #actualSaveMoney:DECIMAL#
ACTUAL_SAVE_RATE = #actualSaveRate:DECIMAL#
TENDER_DEPART = #tenderDepart:VARCHAR#
TENDER_CODE = #tenderCode:VARCHAR#
BID_DEPART = #bidDepart:VARCHAR#
BID_DEPART_CODE = #bidDepartCode:VARCHAR#
SUPERVISION_DEPART = #supervisionDepart:VARCHAR#
SUPERVISION_DEPART_CODE = #supervisionDepartCode:VARCHAR#
CHENGBAN_STATUS = #chengbanStatus:VARCHAR#
CHENGBAN_MAN = #chengbanMan:VARCHAR#
CHENGBAN_DEPART = #chengbanDepart:VARCHAR#
CHENGBAN_MSG = #chengbanMsg:VARCHAR#
CHENGBAN_DATE = #chengbanDate:DATE#
REPORT_DATE = #reportDate:DATE#
EXECUTOR = #editUserId:VARCHAR#
EXECUTOR_NAME = #editUserName:VARCHAR#
PROCESS_INST_ID = #processInstId:DECIMAL#
IS_GOON_AUDIT = #isGoonAudit:DECIMAL#
PROJECT_NATURE = #projectNature:VARCHAR#
where COMPLETION_CODE = #completionCode:VARCHAR#

update ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION

update ZC_EB_PRO_COMPLETION set ID = #record.completionId#, PRO_CODE = #record.proCode:VARCHAR#, PRO_NAME = #record.proName:VARCHAR#, CO_CODE = #record.coCode:VARCHAR#, CO_NAME = #record.coName:VARCHAR#, COMPLETION_CODE = #record.completionCode:VARCHAR#, CAI_GOU_TIME = #record.caiGouTime:DATE#, PRO_CONTENT = #record.proContent:VARCHAR#, ENTRUST_CODE = #record.entrustCode:VARCHAR#, CAI_GOU_TYPE = #record.caiGouType:VARCHAR#, MONEY_SOURCE = #record.moneySource:VARCHAR#, MONEY_CLOSE_ACCOUNT = #record.moneyCloseAccount:VARCHAR#, MARKET_PRICE = #record.marketPrice:DECIMAL#, PLAN_MONEY = #record.planMoney:DECIMAL#, ACTUAL_STOCK_MONEY = #record.actualStockMoney:DECIMAL#, ACTUAL_SAVE_MONEY = #record.actualSaveMoney:DECIMAL#, ACTUAL_SAVE_RATE = #record.actualSaveRate:DECIMAL#, TENDER_DEPART = #record.tenderDepart:VARCHAR#, TENDER_CODE = #record.tenderCode:VARCHAR#, BID_DEPART = #record.bidDepart:VARCHAR#, BID_DEPART_CODE = #record.bidDepartCode:VARCHAR#, SUPERVISION_DEPART = #record.supervisionDepart:VARCHAR#, SUPERVISION_DEPART_CODE = #record.supervisionDepartCode:VARCHAR#, CHENGBAN_STATUS = #record.chengbanStatus:VARCHAR#, CHENGBAN_MAN = #record.chengbanMan:VARCHAR#, CHENGBAN_DEPART = #record.chengbanDepart:VARCHAR#, CHENGBAN_MSG = #record.chengbanMsg:VARCHAR#, CHENGBAN_DATE = #record.chengbanDate:DATE#, REPORT_DATE = #record.reportDate:DATE#, EXECUTOR = #record.editUserId:VARCHAR#, EXECUTOR_NAME = #record.editUserName:VARCHAR#, PROCESS_INST_ID = #record.processInstId:DECIMAL#, IS_GOON_AUDIT = #record.isGoonAudit:DECIMAL#, PROJECT_NATURE = #record.projectNature:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select distinct su.zc_su_code,su.zc_su_name from Zc_Eb_Signup_Pack zsp,Zc_Eb_Signup ss,zc_b_supplier su,ZC_Eb_Pack pa where zsp.signup_id= ss.signup_id and ss.provider_code = su.zc_su_code and zsp.pack_code = pa.pack_code and pa.entrust_code= #value# and zsp.bid_doc_id is not null
